belongs_to_collection.name: Dragon Media's LAPD: Los Angeles Police Dads Collection

overview: Here is director Chi Chi LaRue's awaited follow-up to his top-selling Dragon Media Raw feature LAPD Los Angeles Police Dads. In this second edition, the dirty filthy daddy cops hunt down perps for a pounding in the hopes it will set them straight once and for all. What is actually exposed are that the lines between cop and criminal are more blurred than ever. Enjoy this cum-soaked, ass-ripping, bareback fuckfest.
title: LAPD 2: Los Angeles Police Dads 2
